thread.title_full: South Farm Poised For New Future | Local News | caledonianrecord.com

author: Robert Blechl rblechl@caledonian-record.com Staff Writer
title: South Farm Poised For New Future | Local News | caledonianrecord.com
text: At one time, for decades, the historic South Farm along Route 18 next to Profile School in Bethlehem was part of a sprawling Rocks Estate. Today, it’s under the ownership of Nigel Manley, the longtime Rocks general manager and Christmas tree farmer who retired those posts in 2022 while continuing on in a part-time capacity as the senior outreach coordinator for Forest Society North at The Rocks. kAm%@ 2==2J E96 4@?7FD:@? @7 D@>6 H9@ 36=:6G6 E92E %96 #@4 AD9:C6 u@C6DED[ DE:== 6?4@>A2DD6D $@FE9 u2C>[ |2?=6J D6E E96 C64@C5 DEC2:89E E@ D2J E96 $@FE9 u2C> @A6C2E:@? :D 9:D 2=@?6 2?5 H:E9 ?@ 4@??64E:@?
